channel.title: Log Analysis on My Cybersecurity Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Log Analysis on My Cybersecurity Blog

item.title: Cap HTB CTF Machine
item.description: Cap is an Linux machine running an HTTP server that performs administrative functions including performing network captures. Improper controls result in Insecure Direct Object Reference giving access to another user’s capture. The capture contains plaintext credentials and can be used to gain foothold. A Linux capability is then leveraged to escalate to root.
